page.title: 14BROADFORD YOUTH CLUB
page.content: {Broadford Youth Club}takes place in Broadford Old School at{Harapul.}The building has 4 rooms.One room is used for playing basketball and other games the other is for cooking and relaxing. The other two have games in them such as pool tables,darts and table tennis. The club is open on Friday nights from seven till ten giving three hours of activites which is quite a long time to do as you like.There is a disco night once a month.About 45 people go to the club and there is four supervisors. Jack Fraser is the person in overall charge. The club rooms are also used for Boys Brigade and part of one room is set aside for the Model Railway Club.The youth club would be open on more nights if there were more supervisors.
